Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins > OpenColorIO

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • UObject
  • UOpenColorIOColorTransform

References

   
Module OpenColorIO
Header /Engine/Plugins/Compositing/OpenColorIO/Source/OpenColorIO/Public/OpenColorIOColorTransform.h
Include #include "OpenColorIOColorTransform.h"

Syntax

UCLASS ()  
class UOpenColorIOColorTransform : public UObject

Remarks

Object used to generate shader and LUTs from OCIO configuration file and contain required resource to make a color space transform.
